title: 'I ordered size is 44 but seller send size is 42'
'Just an amazing product'
body: The product is really very nice and I'm so happy having this. Its fabric, stitching and fitting, all are perfect. I think this is a worthy purchase. Thanks a lot to Amazon and the seller.
